name: Postman Revenge
description:
Welcome to the world of "Postman Revenge"! In this exciting new game, you play as a brave postman who must deliver packages in a world destroyed by dragons. With engaging gameplay, you'll explore a vast world full of danger and adventure.

Use your skills to avoid obstacles and deliver as many packages as possible... and beware of dragons! So grab your mailbag and get ready to take on the world of "Postman Revenge"!

HOW TO PLAY:

  1. You should always drive forward (to the right) if your postman exits the screen you lose.
  2. Press the spacebar to drop packages, you always drop the first package in the package queue at the bottom of the screen.
  3. The type of  thrown parcel must match the type of parcel indicated on the sign near the house.
  4. If your score goes negative, you lose.
  5. Avoid obstacles... and beware of dragons!

Good luck!

-----------------------

Credits:

  • Music: Maksym "Shigure" Rodin | Twitter
  • Sound effects: https://mixkit.co/
  • Graphics: https://www.midjourney.com/
